gym_manager

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • gym_manager.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Date>

    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    This class Date is used to create a date object. It contains the day, month, and year of the date.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Date date)
        This method is used to see organize dates by comparing them.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Date>
        Parameters:
        date - date object
        Returns:
        int 0 if the dates are equal, 1 if the date is greater than the date passed in, -1 if the date is less than the date passed in.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        This method is used to see if the date is valid. This method checks if the dates are valid including leap years.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the dates is valid, false if the dates is not valid.

      • BirthdayIsValid

        public boolean BirthdayIsValid()
        This method is used to see if the birthday is valid.
        Returns:
        boolean if the date is less than today's date. False if the birthday is today or a future date.

      • IsOlderThan18

        public boolean IsOlderThan18()
        This method is used to see if the member is 18 years or older.
        Returns:
        boolean True if the date is greater than or equal to 18 , false if the date is less than 18.

      • MembershipDateIsValid

        public boolean MembershipDateIsValid()
        This method is used to see if the member's membership is expired.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the expiration date is greater than today's date, false if the expiration date is less than today's date.
